attributes.additional_details:
I hereby petition the Home Office to ensure the The Post Office update its address database to reflect to current post towns and more importantly counties.
For too long now the Post Office (plus many government departments and large businesses) have refused to show and use the correct postal address on many forms of comminication.
One typical such example is that of the old defunct county of Humberside. The county was abolished more than TEN years ago, but the Post Office still believe it exists!
An other example is Catterick Garrison. The correct post town is Richmond, as confirmed by the local council. The Post Office refuse to accept this fact.
